name: Dream Room VR
description:
I created my dream room as a hobby project to get more familiar with Unreal Engine. Here I created all the 3D assets, light setup and programming work myself using blueprints. The project took about 3 weeks and ended on 30.06.2019.

It's optimized for OpenXR Oculus HMDs. No Index or HTC Vive support!

Here to my Artstation page for this project: 
https://www.artstation.com/artwork/2q22la
